msbt.message: Guess what? I finally own something that even I have trouble lifting. Yep! I have a house now, !It's got walls, a flooreven a ceiling! I can finally do jumping jacks without ripping a hole in my home!
Hey, I heard your tent finally hit the gym and bulked up to a house. Congrats, !I'm thinking I might drop by some time to check on your free weight situation. Keep an eye out!
Wow! Your house got swole! Like, lifting-hills-and-drinking-protein- shakes-by-the-river-full swole.It looks ALMOST as swole as you do! Having a buff house means being a buff owner, am I right, ?
Word is Tom Nook scouted you for his "find some new faces" team. Solid draft!The more neighbors we have, the more muscle mass we can all build. That's science, !
Honestly, I was hoping the new Resident Services building would have a public gym, .Don't get me wrong, the building is great! It's wild to think this used to be a deserted island, but stillgym.

I gotta be honestI'm kinda sad that Timmy and Tommy aren't selling out of that tent anymore, .That place was decked out like some sort of secret hideout. It was so cool!But I get it. You have to move on. So I'm gonna be extra pumped for what they'll do with their own store!
Nook's Cranny is way nicer since the remodel. I can buy protein powder without bumping into anyone now!Hmm I wonder if Timmy and Tommy would ever consider branching out into fitness gear,
Blathers is a hoot! Have you met him yet? I showed him a fossil, and he JUSTKEPTTALKING.He said it was a fossil from a super- strong dinosaur. I didn't understand the rest, but wow! He knows a lot!
The museum's gotten some major gains. I'm impressed, !When I think about how it used to be a scrawny little tent, and how ripped it's becomeI just get so proud!
I'm so glad the tailor shop is finally open. I've been working out so much that none of my clothes fit anymore.
That bridge opens up so many more workouts, .So far, I've just been jumping the river to train agility, but with a bridge I can do endurance sprints too!
I love the new incline! I've been running up and down it all day. My legs are marmalade, !
Have you met yet? You know, the athlete that just moved in.I gotta say, one look at those biceps andI'm pretty sure I've got another island rival, !
Hey, you been to the museum's new art exhibit yet, ?Having a room full of paintings and sculptures of amazing muscles is the best idea I've heard since I got here!
